openstack_networking_qos_minimum_bandwid.description: Manages a V2 Neutron QoS minimum bandwidth rule resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.

qos_policy_id.description: The QoS policy reference. Changing this creates a new QoS minimum bandwidth rule.

min_kbps.description: The minimum kilobits per second. Changing this updates the min kbps value of the existing
